description: The default text color for an avatar.

A map of avatar color suffixes to use. Each key will be used
as an avatar suffix name, and the value will be a list of two
colors where the first item is the background color and the
second item is the text color.

usedBy.description: Includes the css for the Avatars.

parameter.name: light-theme
parameter.description: Boolean if using the light theme.

parameter.name: include-suffixes
parameter.description:
Boolean if the avatar color suffixes
    should be included.

description:
Creates a single _theme_ for the Avatar. It simply creates a
class name with the new background and text color with the given
suffix.

parameter.name: suffix
parameter.description: The class name suffix to use.

usedBy.description: Includes the css for the Avatars.
